welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started with tracking steps and competing with friends.

mobile.content: Quick tour to get you started!

stepCounter.title: Your Step Counter
stepCounter.content: This shows your current daily steps. It updates in real-time when you sync your fitness tracker.

streak.title: Daily Streak ðŸ”¥
streak.content: Keep your streak alive by submitting steps every day. The longer your streak, the more bragging rights!

mobile.content: Submit daily to keep your streak!

leagues.title: Your Leagues
leagues.content: See all the leagues you're part of. You're automatically enrolled in the World League where everyone competes!

joinLeague.title: Join a League
joinLeague.content: Join an existing league using an invite code from a friend or coworker.

submitButton.title: Submit Steps
submitButton.content: Click here to submit your daily steps. You can connect Apple Health, Google Fit, or enter manually.

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.content: Check how you rank against others. Filter by day, week, or month to see different competitions.

analytics.title: Your Analytics
analytics.content: Track your progress with detailed charts and heatmaps. See patterns in your step activity.

createLeague.title: Create a League
createLeague.content: Start your own league to compete with friends, family, or coworkers. You can make it public or invite-only.

actionsMenu.title: Quick Actions
actionsMenu.content: Use the Actions menu to submit steps, create leagues, or join competitions from anywhere.

helpMenu.title: Need Help?
helpMenu.content: You can restart any tour from the Help menu. We also have support and FAQ available.

settings.title: Settings
settings.content: Customize your profile, connect fitness trackers, and manage notifications.

complete.title: You're All Set! ðŸš€
complete.content: You're ready to start your step journey. Good luck, and may your step count be high!

intro.title: Create Your First League
intro.content: Leagues are where the competition happens! Let's set up your first league.

nameField.title: League Name
nameField.content: Choose a memorable name for your league. This is how others will find it.

privacySetting.title: Privacy Settings
privacySetting.content: Public leagues can be joined by anyone. Private leagues require an invite code.

weekStart.title: Week Start
weekStart.content: Choose when weekly leaderboards reset (Monday is recommended for consistency).

inviteMembers.title: Invite Members
inviteMembers.content: Share the invite link with friends. They can join with one click!

createButton.title: Create League
createButton.content: Click here when you're ready to create your league and start competing!

meta.name: Submit Steps
meta.description: Learn the three ways to submit

intro.title: Submitting Your Steps
intro.content: Let's walk through the step submission form so you can log your activity quickly.

datePicker.title: Pick a Date
datePicker.content: Choose which day you're submitting steps for, including past dates if needed.

stepsInput.title: Enter Steps
stepsInput.content: Type the number of steps shown on your tracker or screenshot.

screenshotUpload.title: Upload Proof
screenshotUpload.content: Add a screenshot for verification so your steps count toward verified rankings.

appleHealth.title: Apple Health
appleHealth.content: Connect Apple Health for automatic syncing. Your steps will be imported directly from your iPhone or Apple Watch.

googleFit.title: Google Fit
googleFit.content: Connect Google Fit to sync steps from Android devices or Wear OS watches.

manualEntry.title: Manual Entry
manualEntry.content: No fitness tracker? No problem! Enter your steps manually from any source.

photoProof.title: Photo Verification
photoProof.content: For accuracy, you can upload a screenshot of your step count as proof.

submitButton.title: Submit Now
submitButton.content: After entering your steps, click Submit to record them for today!

confirmation.title: Submission Confirmed!
confirmation.content: Your steps are now recorded. Check the leaderboard to see where you rank!

intro.title: The Leaderboard
intro.content: This is where you see how you stack up against the competition!

timeFilters.title: Time Filters
timeFilters.content: Switch between daily, weekly, and monthly views to see different competition periods.

filters.title: Sort & Verify Filters
filters.content: Sort by steps or streaks and filter verified vs unverified entries for clearer rankings.

yourPosition.title: Your Position
yourPosition.content: Your row is highlighted so you can quickly find yourself in the rankings.

highFive.title: High Fives ðŸ‘‹
highFive.content: Give high fives to motivate other participants. Spread the encouragement!

intro.title: Your Analytics Dashboard
intro.content: Dive deep into your step data with charts, trends, and insights.

heatmap.title: Activity Heatmap
heatmap.content: See your activity patterns at a glance. Darker colors mean more steps on that day.

breakdown.title: Daily Breakdown
breakdown.content: Review detailed daily submissions to spot gaps and plan future goals.

personalStats.title: Personal Records
personalStats.content: Track your best streaks and personal highs to stay motivated.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.content: Set your display name, avatar, and bio. This is how others see you.

displayName.title: Display Name
displayName.content: Your display name shows up on leaderboards and league cards.

navigation.title: Settings Tabs
navigation.content: Use these tabs to switch between profile, preferences, and proxy settings.

save.title: Save Changes
save.content: Save updates to keep your profile information current.

intro.title: Admin Analytics
intro.content: Review how tours perform across the platform from this dashboard.

kpis.title: Tour KPIs
kpis.content: Track starts, completions, and feedback volume to gauge tour performance.

completion.title: Completion Rates
completion.content: Identify which tours users complete most often and which need improvement.

feedback.title: Feedback Summary
feedback.content: Review ratings to understand which tours feel helpful or confusing.

dropoff.title: Drop-off Funnel
dropoff.content: See where users abandon tours so you can refine specific steps.

feedback.title: How was this tour?
feedback.description: Your feedback helps us improve the tour experience.
